description: Using this tool daily to stage/unstage hunks from big commits. Especially useful when splitting commits with "rebase -i".

This gui is very simple and cannot be compared with other platform tools like SourceTree or Git Extensions, but it is the best that I was able to find. I mix the usage of this and command line but this helps with visualisation when  I want to see the structure of commits and branches. Works fine even with bigger solutions in contrary to GitG which keeps crashing.
